website_summaries.verdict: The Kyocera Jax is a functional cell phone, but there are better basic handsets in Virgin mobile's lineup.
pros: The Kyocera Jax is compact and easy to use
Its feature set includes voice dialing
cons: The Kyocera Jax's design isn't durable and its display is low-resolution

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR ME!
customer_reviews.text: Do not meet my needs . I was not able to connect to my mothers Assurance wireless account. Product appeared to be low-end.
customer_reviews.author: luis rivera

customer_reviews.title: it worked great,, like new
customer_reviews.text: i use this all the time, it worked great, , like new, great bang for the buck,
customer_reviews.author: Len cali

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone, had to order this one because the last one I had got water in it.
customer_reviews.author: lovely girl

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad who's been with Virgin mobil for so many years now. He's 86 years old and it just fit's all his basic needs. the speakerphone has great quality sound, the buttons and screen were just right. The only setback was the mini usb for charging is a bit too small for someone his age (hard of hearing and hard of seeing). Other than that were happy for him.
customer_reviews.author: the greggster

customer_reviews.title: Good Replacemen
customer_reviews.text: My daughter lost her cell phone. This was a good replacement for a low cost. Glad it didn't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: karen cooke

customer_reviews.title: Everything works is just that when i want to erased my texts i have to do it one by one and i don't like that.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing wrong with this phone.Everything works is just that when i want to erased my texts i have to do it one by one and i don't like that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's not a Flip
customer_reviews.text: I should have realized that buttons would be accidentally pushed while carrying this in my pocket. It's always doing weird things in there. Other than that, it's a pretty good phone for the price. And the battery lasts a lot longer since I've got it turned off most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works just like the last one I had . very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Farris

customer_reviews.title: PREPAID PHONE OK
customer_reviews.text: THE PHONE WAS FINE, I TWO OTHERS OF THE SAME AND THEY WERE GOOD TO. I WAS PLEASE WENT IT ARRIVED, IT LOOK BRAND NEW.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Mazz

customer_reviews.title: This phone????? uuuuuughhhhhh
customer_reviews.text: Not at all satisfied. It has none of the features of the Kyocera Jax prepaid phone I replaced. There are hardly no ringtones. Also, I don't have the ringtone option I loved which was the ringtone that announces the person's name that is calling. Also, no option to have no ringtone for certain callers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PHONE!
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THIS TO REPLACE AN EXISTING PHONE I USED WITH VIRGIN MOBILE PREPAID PLAN. I AM NOT A BIG CELL PHONE USER AND FIND THIS MEETS ALL MY NEEDS. IT WAS EASY TO TRANSFER MY BALANCE FROM VIRGIN & LOVE THE SIZE OF THE PHONE. I WOULD RECOMMEND IT.
customer_reviews.author: LARSON

customer_reviews.title: Kyocera Jax Prepaid phone by Virgin Mobile is a Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Good loud ring for my brother who is aged and doesn't want anything fancy just plain. This however replaced the old one he had and dropped so many time and had it taped up. The speaker phone feature is good, he is hard of hearing in one ear but can hear this one! perfect size, slightly bigger then the one he had. He recognizes the use of it since it's similar to the one he had. Gave it five stars I gave it as a gift to him and he is extremely, pleased. All features are very adequate and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bare minimum
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, since the advent of smartphones, manufacturers are putting less and less of an effort into producing decent quality traditional cell phones. This one was apparently made with the minimum effort to say they have an entry level phone in the category. Poor sound quality (glaring ringtone quality, particularly) and batteries that need recharging almost as frequently as my smartphone make this an emergency-for grandma-only kind of CP.
customer_reviews.author: The Naked Truth Marketer

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this little phone. It has excellent reception and a nice loud speaker (with a volume control, of course) and it is great as a backup. Unfortunately, it is easy to lose due to the small size. I need to order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Radar Dude

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I just needed a phone for texting and this phone gets the job done well for the price. The only thing that got me was the fact that this phone only can use the paylo plans and I was bummed that it wouldn't do the texter's delight plan but it wasn't too big of a deal, just had to pay about 10 bucks extra. Phone is also super light! It felt like a barbie phone or something but I thought it was nice because I could easily shove it in my pocket or throw it in my purse. My purse already has too much crap in it so this phone was great because it didn't make it any heavier, hahaha.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to a friend for emergency he using it every day
customer_reviews.author: robert auker

customer_reviews.title: Weird Phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is just weird it will start going off non-stop as if you have a message but when you check it there's nothing. Sometimes I have to shut it off and then back on to get it to stop and sometimes it will just stop by itself. I have no clue as to what sets if off. This is not good because one time I ignored it and I did actually have a real message, crazy. I have 2 of these and they both do it so it's not like one of them is defective, they both are.
customer_reviews.author: chump_change

customer_reviews.title: Kyocera JAX Virgin Mobile cell phone
customer_reviews.text: I like this phone. I had one once before and had no problems with it till I dropped it in the toilet. I'll be more careful next time (until they make a water proof phone) Anyway, good phone for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Kyocera JAX Prepaid Phone (Virgin Mobile)
customer_reviews.text: Purchased because lost battery in old phone and battery replacement was almost $40. This phone arrived in reasonable time and in good condition. Phone works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: ndgant

customer_reviews.title: I apologize for my earlier feedback that I think this is my real rush excellent
customer_reviews.text: pido disculpa por mi anterior feedback creo que me apresure esta es mi verdadero PRECISIACION excelente. I apologize for my earlier feedback that I think this is my real rush excellent PRECISIACION
customer_reviews.author: gerardo hernandez

customer_reviews.title: wack
customer_reviews.text: I didnt want an obama phone. This is false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Kory Houston

customer_reviews.title: Good basic phone
customer_reviews.text: I have had this phone since 2009 and it has worked great for the last almost 4 years. Battery life is still great, I get almost a week out of a full charge still to this day. I use the phone a couple times a day. One feature I like is the ability to lock the keys since it would be easy to accidentally push buttons since it is a bar phone. Can't comment on texting and web access, I do neither on a cell. I gave 4 stars because the keys are a bit small, otherwise has been a great phone!
customer_reviews.author: C. DeMarco

customer_reviews.title: Do not count of Virgin Mobile
customer_reviews.text: The worst phone and minute plan you can buy. I lost 63 dollars using this phone. The minutes will be lost if not used right away. Do not count on Virgin Mobile customer service to help you.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: hmmmmmmm, wow
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone free from the government. It is very nice but I cant download ringtone or wallpaper. I can get on facebook and amazon and google. IF YOU ARE ON EBT, ON SSDI, MEDICARE, MA, SSI OR OTHER PROGRAMS YOU CAN GET 250 FREE TALK AND 250 FREE TEXT. you can update by purchasing larger packets, like I think its 20 for 1,000.00 minutes. I have 30 dollar a month unlimited. so I save 20 a month from my prior pre paid carrier. find out more online from assurance wireless.
customer_reviews.author: katiecat

customer_reviews.title: I HAD MY PHONE FOR OVER SIX YEARS, IT ...
customer_reviews.text: I HAD MY PHONE FOR OVER SIX YEARS, IT FINALLY CRACKED , STILL WORKS, BUT NOW I HAVE TO ORDER ANOTHER ONE, CAN'T WAIT TO GET THEM
customer_reviews.author: Vegmuffin

customer_reviews.title: Free phone
customer_reviews.text: I got the phone though a program. It has no camera and a lot of time you can't hear the other person. So I basically text because its free. But calling or texting there is no name.
customer_reviews.author: Pgenter

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS PHONE
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great. No static, easy to use, light weight, easy navigation, no dropped calls from Virgin. Cons - long wait for customer service and no camera.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Demech

customer_reviews.title: Throwaway phone
customer_reviews.text: Obama, why do you do everything halfway. At least you could send me a phone that gets service. Sprint doesn't have good coverage where I live so the phone is kind of useless. Of course, if I get on my bicycle and ride a half mile down the road I get service but I don't think I'll be doing that in the rain. My friends Iphone works just fine when my JAX doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for an Obama phone.
customer_reviews.text: Its ok for a free phone. This is the "obama-phone" they gave me. Thanks Obama! But its kinda cheap. I wish it was an iPhone 5 or 6.
customer_reviews.author: MeWiseMagic

product_meta.title: Kyocera JAX Prepaid Phone (Virgin Mobile)
product_meta.description:
The Kyocera Melo S1300 is a sleek CDMA cell phone with MMS and SMS text messaging features. This device has BREW for downloading games and content, micro USB port, and GPS capabilities. The Melo also comes equipped with a full-duplex speakerphone, easy-to-use functions, calendar, and support for multiple languages including Spanish. 





AMAZON.COM
Easy on the pocket--both in terms of size and affordability, the Kyocera Jax phone for Virgin Mobile measures just 0.51 inches thin and weighs a svelte 2.5 ounces. It's a great on-the-go communications companion with access to voice calls as well as text messaging and social networking. Other features include an integrated speakerphone, backlit alpha-numeric keypad, 250-entry phonebook, personal organization tools, and up to 3.3 hours of talk time. 

 



The super-slim Kyocera Jax is perfect for staying in touch via talk and text. With Virgin Mobile, you can choose a pay-as-you-go plan where you pay for just the minutes you use, or select from one of several monthly plans. Those who love to talk can choose the Totally Unlimited Calling for $49.99 per month, while messaging fanatics can choose monthly no-annual-contract plans that combine talk minutes and unlimited messaging--or just choose unlimited messaging with voice calls charged at 10¢ per minute (see more details on pricing below).  

KEY FEATURES
 * Full messaging suite including SMS text, MMS picture, instant messaging (IM), and personal e-mail. 
 * Link to your favorite social networking sites including Facebook, MySpace, Flickr, and YouTube. 
 * Buddy Beacon lets you broadcast your location to friends and family and you can turn it on when you're feeling sociable or turn it off when you're not. 
 * 1.8-inch color display (128 x 160 pixels, 65K colors) 
 * Standard alpha-numeric keypad with backlighting 
 * Speakerphone with dedicated function key 
 * Vibrate alert 
 * Phonebook with up to 250 entries and up to five numbers each 
 * Web browser 
 * Organizer tools including alarm, calculator, scheduler, stopwatch, timer, tip calculator, and world clock 
 * Micro USB connector 
 * Downloadable games, ringtones, graphics and more 
 * HAC compliant 
 * TTY/TDD support for the hearing impaired 
 * Bi-lingual interface (English and Spanish) 

 Vital Statistics
The Kyocera Jax weighs 2.5 ounces and measures 4.29 x 1.73 x 0.51 inches. Its 700 mAh lithium-ion battery is rated at up to 3.3 hours of talk time, and up to 200 hours (8.3 days) of standby time. It runs on the 800/1900 CDMA frequencies; 1xRTT voice and data capable. 

 What's in the Box
Kyocera Jax handset, rechargeable battery, charger, quick start guide, user manual 

 

VIRGIN MOBILE PREPAID PRICING
With Virgin Mobile, you can pay only for the calling time you use. You can choose a plan that's based just on minutes (with rates between 5¢ and 10¢ per minute, depending on the amount of minutes you buy). Or, you can choose a monthly plan with no annual contract--including the All-In contract plan with either 500, 1000 or unlimited minutes as well as unlimited messaging and data services. Pay-as-you-go users can easily Top-Up your Virgin Mobile account right from your phone. First, buy a Top-Up card at one of the thousands of retailers that carry them; or register your debit card, credit card, or PayPal account at the Virgin Mobile USA web site in order to add minutes to your account directly from your phone.  Additionally, you can choose from a variety of mobile messaging plans, which includes text and picture messaging, e-mail, and IM (via AOL and Yahoo!). Virgin Mobile USA's national coverage is powered by the nationwide Sprint PCS network. 

 Virgin Mobile contributes 5 percent of profits from downloadable content to The RE*Generation, its pro-social initiative to help homeless teens, as well as provides postage-paid return envelopes in every new package for customers to recycle old phones.
feature_bullets: Affordable, super-slim phone for staying in contact via voice, messaging and social networking
Pay for only the calling time you use with Virgin Mobile's minutes or monthly plans--no annual contract required
Web browser; speakerphone; personal organizer; 250-entry phonebook; bi-lingual interface
Up to 3.3 hours of talk time, up to 200 hours (8.3 days) of standby time
What's in the Box: handset, battery, charger, printed documentation
